title: Research diagnostic criteria for mild cognitive impairment with Lewy bodies: A systematic review and meta-analysis
abstract: Operationalized research criteria for mild cognitive impairment with Lewy bodies (MCI‐LB) were published in 2020. The aim of this systematic review and meta‐analysis was to review the evidence for the diagnostic clinical features and biomarkers in MCI‐LB set out in the criteria.
